title: She Said She's Not Going Anywhere
itunes:title: She Said She's Not Going Anywhere
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been in a relationship for a little over 3 years. This man treated me like a queen and I just knew that he was the one. Right when I was ready to get married again, my man’s skeletons came out of the closet. He admitted that there is this woman that has been in his life for many years, but there’s nothing to worry about because he’s not sleeping with her. I believed him because he spends quality time with me every day......

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
